metadata.title: CVE-2024-5971 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Undertow, where the chunked response hangsafter the body was flushed. The response headers and body were sent but theclient would continue waiting as Undertow does not send the expected 0\r\ntermination of the chunked response. This results in uncontrolled resourceconsumption, leaving the server side to a denial of service attack. Thishappens only with Java 17 TLSv1.3 scenarios.

criterions.comment: undertow package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
